csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.1mlz1"
      default-locale="en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation
    et-al-min="3"
    et-al-use-first="1">
    <layout>
      <names variable="author">
        <name form="short" delimiter=", " and="text"/>
      </names>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
